name: buggedcom/phpvideotoolkit
description: PHPVideoToolkit is a set of classes aimed to provide a modular, object oriented and accessible interface for interacting with videos and audio through the FFmpeg program.

suggest.tedivm/stash: Stash is required to utilise PHPVideoToolkits Default Cache class 'Cache_Stash', however you can build your own caching classes so that Stash is not required.
suggest.monolog/monolog: Monolog is required to utilise PHPVideoToolkits Default Logging class 'Logger_Monolog', however you can build your own logger classes so that Monolog is not required.
